Actively partner with Product, Engineering, Business Intelligence, and other teams to integrate ML models into initiatives across verticals.
Identify and prioritize high-impact ML opportunities within the first three months, leading their design, implementation, and deployment by month six.
Serve as a thought leader by mentoring junior data scientists and contributing to the growth of Launch Potato’s data science team.
Create containerized ML models using Docker/Kubernetes to ensure efficiency, scalability, and ease of deployment.
analysis: The job responsibilities involve developing and deploying ML solutions, integrating models, and mentoring. Qualitative data analysis in the context of UX research involves synthesizing user feedback, which is not directly related to the technical and strategic focus of the job responsibilities. The responsibilities do not mention qualitative data analysis in the context of user research.
